name: Openheap
body:
Openheap
==================
UplusFTP 启动后最小化
在程序目录下创建一个文件名为ftprun.vbs的文件，并把一下代码copy进去，然后运行这个脚本就可以了。
Set WshShell = WScript.CreateObject("WScript.Shell")
PS_HOME=CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject").GetFile(Wscript.ScriptFullName).ParentFolder.Path
WshShell.Run PS_HOME&"\ftpadmingui.exe", 0
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
